properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 6 at 3:45AM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 5 to 8 ft expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, south or southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and seas 4 to 7 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague
VA out 20 nm and Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore
Island VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM Friday to 1 AM EST
Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
